attributes.action: Give rights to Fathers and not just the children in residency and contact issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fathers have no rights to see their children.

Fathers are victims of resentful Mothers using children as weapons in residency and access disputes.

Stop the unfair treatment of Fathers in the family courts. 

Insist that all child residency issues are treated in a non sexist fashion and stop assuming "Mother is best" all the time" by assuming a 50-50 right to both parents.

Admit that the way Fathers are treated in the family courts is both sexist and contravenes Human Rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
